question: Which of the following statements is correct about the term “Winner’s Curse”?
option1: A situation when growth in jobs created is very low compared to every percentage point rise in GDP.
option2: A situation when the winning bid for an item in an auction exceeds the intrinsic value of the item.
option3: An economic situation when countries with an abundance of the natural resource have less economic growth in comparison to countries with a lesser number of natural resources.
option4: A situation when a country gets very low foreign investment despite being one of the fastest growing economies in the world.
answer: A situation when the winning bid for an item in an auction exceeds the intrinsic value of the item.
explanation: The winner\'s curse is a situation when the winning bid in an auction exceeds the intrinsic value or true worth of an item. This usually happens because of incomplete information, emotions or any other number of factors regarding the item being auctioned; bidders can have a difficult time determining the item\'s intrinsic value.
